lead_paragraph: Mr. Corbyn described the bloc as a crucial tool against climate change and tax evasion, saying there was a “strong socialist case” for remaining.

headline.print_headline: Labour Leader Urges Britons to Choose to Remain in E.U.
headline.main: Jeremy Corbyn, Labour Leader, Urges Britons to Vote to Stay in E.U.

snippet: Mr. Corbyn described the bloc as a crucial tool against climate change and tax evasion, saying there was a “strong socialist case” for remaining.
abstract: British Labour Party leader Jeremy Corbyn calls on Britons to vote to remain in European Union in June 2016 referendum; staunch left-winger and longtime critic of bloc is especially influential among younger voters, but argues nonetheless that union's benefits outweigh its flaws.
